abstract: Comedy Central's "South Park" is offering their take on the Occupy Walt Street protests. Eric Cartman knows he's not to blame for dragging down the physical fitness scores for the other 99 percent of students at South Park Elementary. "How can they blame you for what is clearly President Obama's fault?"
